title: Square, 3rd–4th century
medium:
Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, s-spun wools
Technique; slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping
description: Square on the diagonal with long band emanating from the bottom. Mosaic tile design in the center

tombstone.epitaph:
Square, 3rd–4th century.
3rd–4th century. Medium: warp; S-spun linen. Wefts; S-spun linen, s-spun wools
Technique; slit tapestry with supplementary weft wrapping. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-121.
